overview: Detective Agency No. 2 run by child detectives Tiril and Oliver has a case to solve! Join our heroes and their dog Ocho as they solve mysteries that have even the adults scratching their heads.  Oliver falling off his bike may be just a small thing, but the one who dug all the deep holes that caused his fall should at least pay for a new bicycle wheel. Tiril and Oliver’s investigation into the culprit’s identity leads them to a deserted mountain and a nighttime encounter with the Shadowman. The case takes an unexpected turn when they find a mysterious map. To solve the puzzle they will have to think outside the box as they scrutinize both past and present.  Operation Shadowman is crime for the youngest – clever, engaging, and full of thrills!
title: Operation Shadowman
